name: webhook-api-app
description: How to get started using the BeaconGrid WebHookAPI

scripts.create: claudia create --version dev --region us-east-1 --timeout 30 --role lambda_beacongrid_full_access --api-module index
scripts.deploy: [ -f claudia.json ] && npm run update || npm run create

author: Mehran Hatami <mehran@beacongrid.com>
